entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:38 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:38 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
